original_text: So Paul stood up. He raised his hand towards the people so that they would listen to him. Then he said to them, ‘Some of you are Jews, like us. Some of you are Gentiles who now worship our God. All of you, listen carefully to me.
korean_text: 바울이 일어나 손짓하며 말하되 이스라엘 사람들과 및 하나님을 경외하는 사람들아 들으라

sentences.original_text: He raised his hand towards the people
so that they would listen to him.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 그에게 들을 수 있도록 했습니다.

sentences.original_text: Some of you are Jews, like us.
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 중 일부는 우리와 같은 유대인입니다.

sentences.original_text: All of you, listen carefully to me.
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 모두, 나를 주의 깊게 들으십시오.
